content.content:
Quantum cryptography does not work on Chuck Norris. When something is being observed by Chuck it stays in the same state until he's finished. at the moment he lives at 2727 Tonisha Isle, New Robchester, VA 48056 and YODA said: Truly wonderful, the mind of a child is. witcher quote: You get what you get and be happy with it  Rick and Morty quote: Can somebody just let me out of here? If I die in a cage I lose a bet. 
 SuperHero Illustrious Magneto of Hearts has power to Reality Warping and Magic Resistance.Harry Potter quote: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain.

Chuck Norris doesn't have performance bottlenecks. He just makes the universe wait its turn.
 at the moment he lives at 4166 Daugherty Wells, New Bariland, PA 70019     

 and YODA said: Do. Or do not. There is no try. 

 witcher quote: You cannot do it. You cannot do it, witcheress. In Kaer Morhen, they taught you to kill, so you kill like a machine. Instinctively. To kill yourself takes character, strength, determination and courage. But that, that they could not teach you. 

 Rick and Morty quote: Great, now I have to take over an entire planet because of your stupid boobs. 

 SuperHero Rhino Wolf has power to Levitation and Stealth 

 Harry Potter quote: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain.
